subject: MortgageBrokers.com Receives Approval to Expand Operations to the CAD$32 Billion Market in British Columbia

The Bull ReportApril 30th, 2007
News updates on MortgageBrokers.com
MortgageBrokers.com Receives Approval to Expand Operations to the CAD$32 Billion Market in British Columbia

TORONTO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--MortgageBrokers.com Inc., a subsidiary of MortgageBrokers.com Holdings, Inc. (OTCBB: MBKR - News
), announced today that it has received regulatory approval from the Financial Institution Commission of British Columbia ("FICOM") to begin operating in the province of British Columbia, Canada's second largest market. The Conference Board of Canada forecasts British Columbia's economy will "remain robust" over the next two years, predicting economic growth of 3.9 percent this year and 3.2 percent in 2007. British Columbia can expect strong performances in the construction, manufacturing and mining sectors, as well as residential and non-residential investment.

Read the full release 

About MortgageBrokers.comMortgageBrokers.com is an online lead generator and mortgage brand specializing in the mortgage brokerage sector. The Company is dedicated to re- branding the over 40,000 small and medium mortgage broker (SME) firms in North America while providing these entities scalability through a centralized, shared services platform. MortgageBrokers.com is designed to facilitate continued owners ship of these SME brokers while they work under the umbrella of one globally recognized brand.
